alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 2:17PM MST until March 06 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SUNDAY TO 8 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Northeast winds gusting up to 25 mph. * WHERE...Golden Valley, Musselshell, Northern Carbon, Northern Stillwater, and Southwestern Yellowstone. * WHEN...From 5 AM Sunday to 8 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult due to the snow and poor visibility. This includes the Monday morning commute. Young livestock may be at risk from the wet and cold conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some roads will be wet on Sunday, then freeze quickly by Sunday evening. Expect icy conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone
